Title: Requires police and peace officers receive a lawful order before assisting with immigration enforcement
Summary: Requires police and peace officers receive a lawful order before assisting with immigration enforcement; requires federal agents identify themselves at the request of public officers, police officers or peace officers; establishes penalties for federal agents who fail to identify themselves.
LawCode: Amd ยง1.20, add Art 183 ยง183.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to prohibiting police officers and peace officers from enforcing federal immigration law unless such officer received a lawful order
